title: Mini-Ep 202: Wedding Bells and Weighted Blankets
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 202: Wedding Bells and Weighted Blankets
itunes:subtitle: Doree relishes a light, but sexy novel series that delights Kate, who brings her Google calendar into the intenchie zone. Then, listeners send in their support for the caller who wanted a small wedding, and share thoughts about sleeping on your back an...
description:
Doree relishes a light, but sexy novel series that delights Kate, who brings her Google calendar into the intenchie zone. Then, listeners send in their support for the caller who wanted a small wedding, and share thoughts about sleeping on your back and A313 Retinol.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

OLIVE & JUNE - Get 20% off your first mani system when you use promo code FOREVER35 at oliveandjune.com.

AERA - Go to aeraforhome.com for 20% off diffusers and free shipping with the code FOREVER35.

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

THIRDLOVE - Get 20% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever3510, and use promo code FOREVER3510. For a limited time, get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
